fr.sii.ogham.sms.sender.impl.cloudhopper.session

Class MayReuseSessionStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.sms.sender.impl.cloudhopper.session.BaseSessionHandlingStrategy
      • fr.sii.ogham.sms.sender.impl.cloudhopper.session.MayReuseSessionStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cleanable, ErrorHandler, SessionHandlingStrategy

    public class MayReuseSessionStrategy
extends BaseSessionHandlingStrategy
implements ErrorHandler
    Strategy that attempts to reuse the previous session if possible.

    When sending the first message, a new session is created. Later, when sending the next message, if the session is still alive, this session is reused. As the connection is not actively maintained, the session may be killed by the server. Therefore to check if the session is still alive, an EnquireLink request is sent. If a response is received from the server, then the session is still alive and the message can be sent using the same session. If a failure response or no response is received after some time from the server, then a new session must be created.

    To check if the session is still alive, the EnquireLink request is sent just before sending the real message. In order to prevent sending an EnquireLink request before every message, the date of the last sent message or EnquireLink is kept. This date is compared to a delay to ensure that no EnquireLink is sent during this delay.

    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet

      • messageProcessed

        public void messageProcessed(Sms sms)
        Description copied from interface: SessionHandlingStrategy
        Fired when a message has been processed i.e. either when message has been sent or when an error has been raised. This entrypoint may be useful to do some cleanup or to start background tasks for example.

        This method is always called after SessionHandlingStrategy.messageSent(Sms) and SessionHandlingStrategy.messageNotSent(Sms, SmppException).

        No exception should be thrown because this is used to end the process.

        Specified by:
        messageProcessed in interface SessionHandlingStrategy
        Parameters:
        sms - the sent SMS

      • clean

        public void clean()
        Description copied from interface: Cleanable
        Clean all the opened resources before destruction.

        Generally, this method is called only once per instance. But there may exist some cases where the method is called several times.

        The implementation should ensure that if the method is called several times, the first time cleans the resources and the other calls doesn't do anything.

        Specified by:
        clean in interface Cleanable

      • connect

        protected com.cloudhopper.smpp.SmppSession connect(com.cloudhopper.smpp.SmppClient client)
                                            throws SmppException
        Description copied from class: BaseSessionHandlingStrategy
        Connect the client to the SMSC using a SmppClient.bind(com.cloudhopper.smpp.SmppSessionConfiguration, com.cloudhopper.smpp.SmppSessionHandler) request.

        The configured retry strategy is used to send the bind request to the server i.e. several attempts may be done.

        Overrides:
        connect in class BaseSessionHandlingStrategy
        Parameters:
        client - the client used to send to bind command
        Returns:
        the created session
        Throws:
        SmppException - when the session couldn't be bound
